title: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance RePack
description:
About the Game

Developed by Kojima Productions and PlatinumGames, METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE takes the renowned METAL GEAR franchise into exciting new territory with an all-new action experience. The game seamlessly melds pure action and epic story-telling that surrounds Raiden Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a child soldier transformed into a half-human, half-cyborg ninja who uses his High Frequency katana blade to cut through any thing that stands in his vengeful path!

A huge success on both Xbox 360Ã‚Â® and PlayStationÃ‚Â®3, METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE comes to PC with all the famed moves and action running within a beautifully-realised HD environment.

This new PC version includes all three DLC missions: Blade Wolf, Jetstream, and VR Missions, in addition to all customized body upgrades for Raiden, including: White Armor, Inferno Armor, Commando Armor, RaidenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s MGS4 body, and the ever-popular Cyborg Ninja.

Title: METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE
Genre: Action
Developer: PlatinumGames
Publisher: Konami Digital Entertainment
Release Date: 9 Jan 2014
